%c[default]A leather jacket with Kevlar elements. The traditional outfit of a Bandit, and those who choose to follow that tradition have not been known to live for long in the Zone

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%

%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[default]Typical weak Bandit body armor with chain-mail plates sewn into it for slightly better protection. Almost anyone could make one, but few would have the patience to do so...
Bandit Jacket with gas mask - PNV 'Green'
Bandit Jacket with gas mask Mod. 1 - PNV 'Green'

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+8%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]BulletProof: %c[255,1,255,1]+8%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electric Shock: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[default]Typical Bandit outfit - a leather jacket with Kevlar elements. This modification has a gas mask and, as a result, environmental protection is slightly improved. Equipped with this ensemble, you might last more than a single day in the Zone, but don't push your luck...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[255,1,255,255]BulletProof: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electric Shock: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[default]A typical thick leather trenchcoat offering very little in terms of environmental protection. Often the uniform of choice for thieves and other sordid individuals found scattered all over the Zone...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]BulletProof: %c[255,1,255,1]+23%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electric Shock: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[default]Typically meant to be worn as a secondary protective layer over body armor, this thick, formidable, black leather overcoat has become the trademark 'look' of the Bandit Masters. Surprisingly its protective characteristics are very strong, having been manufactured from 100% pure Chimera hide - a tough, sinewy type of leather that needs to be broken in rigorously before it can be worn, by throwing it repeatedly into a 'Roundabout' anomaly...

%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%

%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electric Shock: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Stamina: %c[255,1,255,1]+180
%c[default]Typically meant to be worn as a secondary protective layer over body armor, this thick, formidable, black leather overcoat has become the trademark 'look' of the Bandit Masters. Surprisingly its protective characteristics are very strong, having been manufactured from 100% pure Chimera hide - a tough, sinewy type of leather that needs to be broken in rigorously before it can be worn, by throwing it repeatedly into a 'Roundabout' anomaly... This variant of the garment has absorbed further anomalous qualities that provide unique health restoration capabilities when worn...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]BulletProof: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electric Shock: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[default]Provides slightly better protection than the Leather Trenchcoat and the common Bandit Jacket, but would struggle to cope with the Zone's severe and ever-changing conditions...

%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%

%c[255,1,255,255]Load-carrying capacity: %c[255,1,255,1]+80kg
%c[default]Exoskeleton designed by Friar under Borov's direction. Similar to other Exoskeleton variants in having extra carrying capacity, but not offering the best protection because of the lack of real science involved in its construction (Bandits not being known for their academic achievements). However, it does serve its designated purpose in granting basic protection while carrying lots of loot...
Duty PSZ-9D Armor Mod. 1 - PNV 'Cats Eye'
Duty PSZ-9D Armor Mod. 1 - PNV 'White Night'

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bulletproof: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electricity: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[default]Manufactured exclusively for the Duty Faction by the Kiev Defensive Scientific Research Institute, this high-end bodysuit was created for rigorous use throughout the Zone. Comprises a heavy PSZ-12p bulletproof vest, a built-in compensation suit, and a Sphere-12M helmet. Facilitates remarkably high mobility while providing solid protection from bullets, shrapnel, anomalies, and radiation. It can be upgraded so that it rivals the Exoskeleton in terms of protection, but does not have the facility to carry artefacts...
Duty PSZ-9D-2 Armor Mod. 1 - PNV 'Cats Eye'
Duty PSZ-9D-2 Armor Mod. 1 - PNV 'White Night'

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bulletproof: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%

%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electricity: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+35%
%c[default]Manufactured exclusively for the Duty Faction by the Kiev Defensive Scientific Research Institute, this high-end bodysuit was created for rigorous use throughout the Zone. Comprises a heavy PSZ-12p bulletproof vest, a built-in compensation suit, and a Sphere-12M helmet with built-in breathing apparatus. Facilitates remarkably high mobility while providing solid protection from bullets, shrapnel, anomalies, and radiation. It can be upgraded so that it rivals the Exoskeleton in terms of protection, but does not have the facility to carry artefacts...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+70%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bulletproof: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electricity: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[default]Duty PSZ-9D armor with improved protection against laceration from bites and cuts. This high-end bodysuit comprises a heavy PSZ-12p bulletproof vest, a built-in compensation suit, and a Sphere-12M helmet, and was created for rigorous use throughout the Zone. Manufactured exclusively for the Duty Faction by the Kiev Defensive Scientific Research Institute

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bulletproof: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+35%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electricity: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[default]Functionally identical to the SEVA suit, the PSZ-9MD comprises a high quality PSZ-9D Duty suit, which offers superb protection from bullets, shrapnel and laceration by mutant claws, combined with a Curtain helmet with integrated life support system and anomalous field suppression devices. This is a well-designed protective suit for the Zone, and very popular among Duty veterans

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+35%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+35%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bulletproof: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electricity: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Telepathy: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Load-carrying capacity: %c[255,1,255,1]+35kg
%c[default]Modified by the Kiev Defensive Scientific Research Institute for the Zone's Duty faction, this customized Exoskeleton is the product of advanced military research, initially intended for the Ukrainian Military for hazardous missions into the Zone. Due to the sheer cost of a single unit, however, as well as the numerous technical problems and design flaws, this unit never reached mass production, although limited numbers continue to be manufactured in clandestine factories to find their way into the Zone. A major benefit of the Exoskeleton is its ability to greatly increase the wearer's physical strength, allowing them to carry more equipment around
SSP-99 Ecologist suit Mod. 1 - PNV 'Cats Eye'
SSP-99 Ecologist suit Mod. 1 - PNV 'White Night'

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bulletproof: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electricity: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[default]The SSP-99 suit has a combined air-filtering and conditioning system, with the main body of the suit impervious to heat and electricity, providing near-invulnerability to the Zone's radiation and anomalous activity. For additional safety, the suit has a sub-layer of powdered Urchin artefact, and includes 2nd generation night vision. Designed to be lightweight, and not a military suit, it does not protect against firearms and explosives

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bulletproof: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electricity: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[default]Designed for guards working with the Scientific community, this highly modified SSP-99 suit incorporates added body protection from bullets and shrapnel. The suit comprises a closed-cycle breathing module and an integrated anomalous field suppression system, offering anomaly and radiation protection equal to that of the SSP-99 suit, with the bullet protection of the SEVA suit. What's more, it has even better explosion protection, lasts longer, and weighs less than the SEVA, plus 2nd generation night vision, making this one of the best suits around for hazardous work in the Zone
Army Bulletproof Vest Mod.1 - PNV 'Cats Eye'
Army Bulletproof Vest Mod.1 - PNV 'White Night'

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bulletproof: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electricity: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+5%
%c[default]A typical Soviet-issue battle dress uniform comprising heavy military boots, and a PSZ-7 (Personal Protection System Model-7) bulletproof vest. Combined with a backpack and combat webbing, this uniform is typical for most of the Military grunts enlisted throughout the Zone. While offering standard protection from bullets and shrapnel, it is totally ineffective against radiation and anomalies...

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bulletproof: %c[255,1,255,1]+23%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electricity: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[default]The Berill-5M armor is used by the Russian Spetsnaz 'special purpose regiments'. Specifically modified for the Zone, it includes a PSZ-9A Military bulletproof vest with a Beryllium coating, and a Sphere-08 helmet. The helmet has a double internal latticework of wound copper mesh to protect the wearer from the Zone's unique psionic emanations. Comes in standard European Woodland camouflage pattern

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bulletproof: %c[255,1,255,1]+23%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electricity: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+10%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bleeding: %c[255,1,255,1]-20%
%c[default]A Berill-5M armored suit whose inner lining is saturated with a streptozoidal lotion, thus significantly speeding up the healing of wounds. It also comes equipped with 1st generation Pilot Night Vision. The suit is particularly durable, being reasonably resistant to occasional firearm damage. Its drawbacks are below average anomaly protection, and its weight...
Military SKAT9M Armor Mod.2 - PNV 'Cats Eye'
Military SKAT9M Armor Mod.2 - PNV 'White Night'

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+35%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+35%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bulletproof: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electricity: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[default]The SKAT9M is a heavy armored suit used by the Ukrainian Military and Stalkers doing Military contract work. It is composed of a PSZ-12p vest, a built-in anomalous field compensation unit, and a Sphere-12 helmet. This armor has quickly become the Military's alternative choice to the Exoskeleton, as it offers similar protection without the extra weight. Durability and above-average anomaly protection have made this suit a favorite among Military professionals and Stalkers alike
Military SKAT10M Armor Mod.3 - PNV 'Cats Eye'
Military SKAT10M Armor Mod.3 - PNV 'White Night'

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+35%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bulletproof: %c[255,1,255,1]+35%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electricity: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+35%
%c[255,1,255,255]Telepathy: %c[255,1,255,1]20
%c[default]Based on the SKAT9M heavy armor, the SKAT10 improves mobility by using more lightweight and better protective materials. Composed of a PSZ-12 Mod. 3 Vest, a built-in anomalous field compensation unit, and a specially reinforced Sphere-12 Mk.2 helmet, the suit is ideal for assault operations in areas containing large numbers of anomalies

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bulletproof: %c[255,1,255,1]+60%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+20%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electricity: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%
%c[255,1,255,255]Load-carrying capacity: %c[255,1,255,1]+5kg
%c[default]A 1st generation Military Exoskeleton prototype, which never went into full scale production due to extremely high manufacturing costs and various, albeit minor, design flaws. Offers good, basic protection against the various dangers encountered throughout the Zone

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bulletproof: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electricity: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%
%c[255,1,255,255]Load-carrying capacity: %c[255,1,255,1]+20kg
%c[default]Exoskeleton armor makes use of powerful servo-motors and electrically stimulated muscle fibre bundles to provide the wearer with superior strength and environmental protection. This one is based around an RPS Industries 'Morph Radiation suit', a tight fitting full bodysuit surrounded with heavy Kevlar plates and composite armor plates (which can be upgraded to titanium). These Radsuits also come with specially made tactical helmets and gas masks. A major benefit of the Exoskeleton is its ability to greatly increase the wearer's physical strength, allowing them to carry more equipment around

%c[255,1,255,255]Impact: %c[255,1,255,1]+45%
%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Explosion: %c[255,1,255,1]+40%
%c[255,1,255,255]Bulletproof: %c[255,1,255,1]+30%
%c[255,1,255,255]Burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Chemical burn: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Electricity: %c[255,1,255,1]+25%
%c[255,1,255,255]Radiation: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%
%c[255,1,255,255]Load-carrying capacity: %c[255,1,255,1]+20kg
%c[default]This 3rd generation Military Exoskeleton prototype originally belonged to a Stalker known as 'Fang', a key member of Strelok's group. The suit never went into full scale production due to extremely high manufacturing costs and various, albeit minor, design flaws. However, limited numbers continue to be manufactured in clandestine factories outside of the Zone. Most of the design defects which used to decrease its mobility have been eliminated, and the armor has been further reinforced to provide excellent protection from bullets and shrapnel, and a good defence against radiation and anomalies

%c[255,1,255,255]Rupture: %c[255,1,255,1]+15%

%c[default]Exoskeleton armor makes use of powerful servo-motors and electrically stimulated muscle fibre bundles to provide the wearer with superior strength and environmental protection. This one is based around an RPS Industries 'Morph Radiation suit', a tight fitting full bodysuit surrounded with heavy Kevlar plates and composite armor plates (which can be upgraded to titanium). These Radsuits also come with specially made tactical helmets and gas masks. A major benefit of the Exoskeleton is its ability to greatly increase the wearer's physical strength, allowing them to carry more equipment around. This one has been damaged by being left in a harsh environment, possibly with its owner still inside, which has reduced its protection characteristics and carrying capacity...

%c[default]Stalker suit of the Mercenary faction. Consists of a reinforced jumpsuit (of various urban camouflage patterns), a customized tactical helmet, and a gas mask based on the M40 US model. Its design is based on equipment used by Special Forces of the Western armies, including the standard belt-mounted pistol holster and carrying pouch. Due to a special treatment of the base fabric, its structural stability has been improved during physical movement of its armor plates. Overall, its protective properties are slightly better than those of the PSZ-7 Military bulletproof armored suits

%c[default]A specially designed Exoskeleton suit smuggled into the Zone from the west (German attention to detail is evident). Based around an RPS Industries 'Morph Radiation suit', a tight fitting full bodysuit surrounded with heavy Kevlar plates and composite armor plates (which in this case have been upgraded to titanium), these Radsuits also come with specially made tactical helmets and gas masks. A major benefit of the Exoskeleton is its ability to greatly increase the wearer's physical strength, allowing them to carry more equipment around. This one contains numerous additional ammunition pouches than the usual variant, as well as titanium-based armor plating within the Radsuit layer underneath

%c[default]Heavily modified Stalker suit, usually worn with a respirator. Features more armor, and better anomaly, radiation, and psionic protection than any other Stalker suit of this type. Created by an unknown manufacturer, its base is a splinter pattern urban camouflage radiation suit/battledress uniform with reinforced leather arm, elbow and kneepads. Over this is a green Tactical Vest with multiple carrying pouches and a mounting place for either two oxygen tanks, a backpack, or a closed-circuit breathing apparatus for the Curtain helmet life support system (a strong, high visibility 'dome' helmet, similar to that of the SEVA suit)

%c[default]Stalker suit manufactured by 'folk craftsmen'. It is an effective combination of a light military Bulletproof Vest and of a rubberized fabric suit. It is reinforced with inserted Kevlar plates and provides good protection from weak gunfire. The former owner of this thing was a real 'Tourist' in every sense of the word, and often went on very difficult excursions into the Zone. He knew how to correctly distribute the weight of his load, and made his own modifications to the suit in order to accomodate that... as a result, this unique Stalker suit has an increased carrying capacity of +10kg...

%c[default]Rumor has it that Ghost never carried a medkit with him. He found this unusual suit in an anomaly containing nothing but the bones of its previous owner, but ss a result, it now possesses the ability to heal automatically... It is an effective combination of a light military Bulletproof Vest and a rubberized fabric suit. It is reinforced with Kevlar plate inserts and provides good protection from weak gunfire. Overall it's lightweight, easily accessible, economical, and offers reasonable protection against radiation, and anomalies...

It is a very effective combination of a heavy-grade military Bulletproof Vest and of a heavy dual-layer rubberized fabric suit... %c[default]Reinforced Stalker suit produced by the Gunsmiths of the Freedom Faction. It is made up of a medium military Bulletproof Vest reinforced with alloy-plated zirconium elements, which provide good protection from bullets and shrapnel at medium to long ranges... The material of the suit consists of two layers: a specially treated leather, and a fabric woven with asbestos yarn. Provides adequate protection from the effects of anomalous activity... This variant has been equipped with a fully-integrated gas mask, which offers better protection against radiation...

%c[default]The SEVA suit is a CBRN (Chemical, Biological, Radiological, Nuclear) Protective suit developed by MIR-12, a clandestine organization that arrived in the Zone shortly after the the second 'incident' in 2006 that nobody seems to know much about, or at least no-one is talking... The SEVA suit represents the pinnacle of personal protection technology available in the Zone, combining a lightweight Bulletproof Vest, a closed cycle breathing system, and an integrated Anomalous Field Suppression Unit [AFSU]...

%c[default]Manufactured by the Gunsmith's of the Freedom Faction, making use of electrically motivated muscle fibre bundles, and powerful servo-motors to provide the wearer with superior strength, and environmental protection. It is composed of two separate pieces of equipment: the Morph Radiation suit, developed by RPS Industries Inc., which boasts heavy Kevlar plates surrounding a tight fitting body-suit, which encompasses the entire body like a second skin, alongside composite armor plates [which can be upgraded to titanium plates]. In addition, these Radsuits also come with specially made Tactical helmets and gas masks... A major benefit of the Exoskeleton is a significant increase in physical strength, allowing for a +25kg carrying capacity...

It was designed for conducting search operations in areas of low anomalous activity. Its higher quality materials result in greater durability. Includes a container capable of holding artefacts... It is used typically by Clear Sky scouts and command.

%c[default]The CS SSP-99 suit has an integrated air-filtering and air-conditioning system with the main body of the suit made out of materials that are resistant to both heat and electricity, providing near-invulnerability to the Zone's radiation, and anomalous activity. For additional protection, the suit is treated with a special substance obtained from 'Urchin' artefacts. It also includes second generation Night-Vision capabilities. Since this suit was designed primarily to protect the wearer from hazardous and toxic elements, it has very poor protection against firearms and explosives...

%c[255,1,255,255]Telepathy: %c[255,1,255,1]+100%\n%c[default]Psychiatrist's Overcoat - a typical Bandit Trenchcoat, only white in colour - very similar to a Medical Coat. Does not offer any protection whatsoever against bullets or shrapnel... Possesses one remarkable property: the capability to entirely negate a Controller's Psi-influence [-100%]... The mask is attached to the Overcoat with a ceramic-based centrifuge, and the built-in Night Vision cannot be upgraded. It is not known who developed this amazing garment, but some have mentioned the possibility of the Dharma Initiative being involved somehow...

%c[default]suit used by Monolith Faction Scientists. Developed in a Secret Lab deep inside the Zone, This suit comprises a closed-cycle breathing module and an integrated anomalous field suppression system. Anomaly and radiation protection is far superior to that of the SSP-99 suit, making the two unmatched in those terms. Superb Night Vision is required because of the dark conditions these Suits are used in... very rare... in fact, no-one really believes they actually exist... until now...

%c[default]This suit has come by its name honestly - It was handcrafted by a Stalker who used to be a Moscow Fireman. Basically, it is a Scientific suit in which the glass from the helmet and its 'lining' have been completely replaced with heat resistant counterparts... It has also become a much heavier suit to wear because of the Asbestos lining that was used in order to make it 100% flame resistant. Possesses reasonable protection against chemical agents... As the suit deteriorates, its protective characteristics decrease... It is equipped with built in, high quality Night Vision...

%c[default]It is not known how this suit fell into the hands of Tirex. We do know, however; that this Armor was modified by Tirex, and then was sold to 'Shaku'. He immediately started them into circulation throughout the Zone... A fairly unremarkable suit with low protective characteristics [still higher than that of a non-upgraded suit]... The main distinguishing feature being its storage capabilities in that it allows for significantly more weight to be carried than other similar models... even most Exoskeletons. 'Tirex' was a Stalker who travelled deep into the Zone, as this suit was designed primarily to carry lots of swag back into safer areas where they could be sold, or traded...

c[default]A SSP-99 chemical protection suit specially designed for the Zone conditions. It is used by scientific expeditions and the eco-stalkers who cooperate with them. It has an integrated air-filtering and air-conditioning system. It is heat and electricity resistant, provides good protection from radiation and biological anomalies. It is resistans to chemically aggressive environments. It is not designed for combat, so it provides neither bullet, nor splinter protection. A built in container for carrying Artefacts is included...
